item.title: Python beginner publishes web application using machine learning [Part 1] Introduction
item.description: ### Purpose of this article Obstetrician and Gynecologist Tomi‘sarticle[[[Self-studypossible]LearningroadmapformachinelearningforPythonbeginners]](https://obgynai.Itriedtocreatetheroadmapmyselfbyreferringto(com/self-study-python-machine-learning/). This article is the first in a series of memo articles. For readability, the article is divided into pieces! (After writing, we will publish an article that summarizes everything) ###Self-introduction My name is Tsuba Mukku. After graduating from Kyushu University, I re-entered the National University School of Medicine. While aiming to graduate from medical school and pass the national exam of doctors, I am also learning pure mathematics and computer science (I also take classes in mathematics and information science).
